data.title: Kyouryou Pikora
data.synopsis: Pikora is a newborn baby dinosaur. But here mother is nowhere to be found. She sets off into the woods to find her.

titles.title: なんじゃもんじゃおばけ

data.title: Nanja Monja Obake
data.title_japanese: なんじゃもんじゃおばけ
data.synopsis: An anime made entirely in sumi-e following a child fox spirit and his morphing ability for haunting but he ends up getting scared himself.

data.title: Go! Go! Veggie-tan
data.synopsis: A fusion of drawn animation, stop-motion animation, and live-action sequences. Go! Go! Veggie-tan tells a quirky tale of a tomato and eggplant that fell to Earth from their spaceship after a meteorite hit them and they became enchanted by local playground equipment.

titles.title: ハスの妖精 ぼにょぼにょ

data.title: Hasu no Yousei: Bonyo Bonyo
data.title_japanese: ハスの妖精 ぼにょぼにょ
data.synopsis: A simple story of a the fairy Bonyo Bonyo being born from a lotus flower and making friends with frogs.

data.title: Neko no Sakusen
data.synopsis: Cats play baseball at night. When their ball goes over the fence a dog is indifferent on giving it back. The cat tries different methods to get revenge.

data.title: Gararin to Gororin
data.synopsis: Catepillar-like Gararin and stone-like Gororin are best friends. One day when they're playing they hear music and Gararin suddenly goes through a transformation.

data.title: Suna Asobi
data.synopsis: Stop-motion animation using sand. Depicts a child going outside to play and exploring nature, rough-housing with friends, and using the full extent of his imagination.

data.title: Hamster Sam
data.synopsis:
Stop-motion animation using a hamster puppet. The anime usually has Sam singing, sometimes strumming his guitar, or dancing.

Note: It is unrelated to Hamster S.A.M. the US children's book series.

data.title: Ongaku Shoujo
data.synopsis:
On her way to her first day of high school, Eri Kumagai is captivated by a girl's singing. Her song is beautiful but ends abruptly when the girl steps on a cat's tail and disrupts the moment. Eri pushes this out of her mind until that same girl rushes into her class late, cat in hand, and claims that the name on the attendance list—Chiharu Yuzuka—is her "false name" and she is actually called Haru Chitose.

Much to Eri's distaste, she cannot escape the eccentric Haru, as the two happen to share the same dormitory room. Haru causes one headache after another, but when she snoops around in Eri's laptop and discovers that she is an online composer, Eri is furious. Haru, enamored by Eri's music, desperately wants to sing with Eri, but Eri is dead set against it. Will the two be able to find common ground?

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

data.title: Aki no Kanade
data.synopsis:
Aki Miyagawa moved to Tokyo to pursue her dream to be a taiko drummer, but had a hard time balancing her strict training regimen with her part-time job. Now, after 15 years, she's returning to coach others for a taiko festival.

(Source: ANN)

Project by J.C.Staff announced to be part of Anime Mirai 2015.
data.background: Aki no Kanade was one of the four films of Anime Mirai 2015 (Young Animator Training Project), a project funded by the Japanese government's Agency of Cultural Affairs in order to support training animators.

data.title: Happy ComeCome
data.synopsis:
Hiroshi is tired of living alone so he orders a maid robot from a company called Happy ComeCome, but ends up with the robot mom Yoshiko instead. Yoshiko acts more motherly than Hiroshi's real mother, and over time she is able to heal his heart.

(Source: ANN)

Project by SynergySP announced to be part of Anime Mirai 2015.

data.title: Kumi to Tulip
data.synopsis:
Kumi is a little girl who lives in a world with sparkling metal skyscrapers, and where robots support everything. Kumi's playground is a garden by one of those skyscrapers with a man-made water fountain, artificial vegetation, and digital water and butterflies. 

Kumi meets an old man who visits the park every day to paint the artificial flowers. The old man tells Kumi of when he discovered a "breathing" tulip sprouting amidst the artificial flowers, and the two decide to watch over the tulip together as it grows.

(Source: ANN)

Project by Tezuka Productions announced to be part of Anime Mirai 2015.

data.title: Kagee Mukashibanashi
data.synopsis: The 1st arc of the Chiyotarou Kodomo Gekijou program that aired on TBS. Every episode is a different Japanese fairy tale told with shadow puppet animation.

data.title: Kagee Aesop Monogatari
data.synopsis: The 2nd arc of the Chiyotarou Kodomo Gekijou program that aired on TBS. Every episode is a different Aesop fable told with shadow puppet animation.

titles.title: Hello Kitty no Hajimete no Christmas Cake
ハローキティのはじめてのクリスマスケーキ

data.title: Hello Kitty no Hajimete no Christmas Cake
data.title_japanese: ハローキティのはじめてのクリスマスケーキ
data.synopsis: Kitty and Mimmy try to bake a Christmas cake for the first time as a gift to their grandparents. But it's much harder than it looks.

titles.title: Hello Kitty no Okaze wo Hiita Santa-san
ハローキティのおかぜをひいたサンタさん

data.title: Hello Kitty no Okaze wo Hiita Santa-san
data.title_japanese: ハローキティのおかぜをひいたサンタさん
data.synopsis: Santa-san has caught a cold after falling into a lake. It's up to Kitty and her friends to make sure Christmas happens on time.

titles.title: Hello Kitty no Minna no Tanoshii Natsuyasumi
ハローキティのみんなの楽しい夏休み

data.title: Hello Kitty no Minna no Tanoshii Natsuyasumi
data.title_japanese: ハローキティのみんなの楽しい夏休み
data.synopsis: Kitty and Mimmy go to the south islands for summer vacation. There they meet an old man that seems familiar (aka Santa-san). Will the old man's secret be found out?

titles.title: Hello Kitty no Santa-san ga Futari Ita
ハローキティのサンタさんが二人いた

data.title: Hello Kitty no Santa-san ga Futari Ita
data.title_japanese: ハローキティのサンタさんが二人いた
data.synopsis: What if there were two Santas? When Santa-san doesn't receive a single Christmas letter he wonders if everyone forgot. But no, that's impossible! Someone else secretly took the letters and he's on the case to find the second Santa.

titles.title: Kitty to Daniel no Suteki na Christmas
キティとダニエルのすてきなクリスマス

data.title: Kitty to Daniel no Suteki na Christmas
data.title_japanese: キティとダニエルのすてきなクリスマス
data.synopsis: Daniel was supposed to come visit Kitty and Mimmy on Christmas. But due to bad weather in New York, he isn't able to fly. The girls are quite saddened but a miracle happens.

titles.title: サンタクロースつかまえた ！

data.title: Santa Claus Tsukamaeta!
data.title_japanese: サンタクロースつかまえた ！
data.synopsis: A simple story about a young boy who stays up on Christmas in order to catch Santa and show the proof to his older friends.

titles.title: サンリオ・クリスマス・ファンタジア

data.title: Sanrio Christmas Fantasia
data.title_japanese: サンリオ・クリスマス・ファンタジア
data.synopsis: Set to Fantasia-like music, the anime pans over a town during their Christmas celebrations while Santa flies across the sky.

titles.title: Kitty to Daniel no Odoru Santa-san no Himitsu
キティとダニエルのおどるサンタさんのひみつ

data.title: Kitty to Daniel no Odoru Santa-san no Himitsu
data.title_japanese: キティとダニエルのおどるサンタさんのひみつ
data.synopsis: Kitty is spending Christmas Eve with Grandpa Anthony and Grandma Margaret. Daniel is joining but he's really jittery and the only solution comes from Santa-san.

data.title: Kanimanji Engi
data.synopsis: An early silhouette animated film by Hidehiko Okuda, Hakusan Kimura and Tomu Uchida. The original story is a Buddhist tale of a young lady who saved a crab (a spiritual being according to Japanese Buddhist faith) from being eaten, and was later saved from danger by the same crab.

titles.title: 勤倹貯蓄 塩原多助

data.title: Kinken Chochiku Shiobara Tasuke
data.title_japanese: 勤倹貯蓄 塩原多助
data.synopsis:
"Industrious farmer Tasuke makes the necessary sacrifices to advance his station in life from a farmer to a store-owner. Based on a well-known kabuki tale Shiobara Tasuke ichitai-ki (The Life Story of Shiobara Tasuke), this parable about the virtues of hard work is based on a true story."

(Source: Mubi)

data.title: Okuni no Tame ni
data.synopsis: Short patriotic war short film by Hakusan Kimura.
